title: METHOD TO CUSTOMIZE A SCREEN APPEARANCE OF A TELEVISION (TV) SET
summary: <SOH> BRIEF SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION <EOH>To achieve above mentioned objects, the method to customize a screen appearance of a television (TV) set, described in the present specification of the invention, provides a user with the decor-appearance on the screen of the TV set according to a personal preference of the user. The method comprises following: providing by a TV service provider at least one decor-channel, which includes at least one decor-appearance; offering the decor-channel to the user as a product; transmitting this at least one decor-channel to at least one TV station; allowing to the user an opportunity to choose the screen decor-appearance from the decor-channel; and providing the decor-appearance on the screen of the television (TV) set according to a personal preference of the user. The decor-channel could be transmitted as the product according to a contract between the user and the TV service provider, or free of charge as a bonus or an additional product. The decor-channel may be included in a portfolio of different channels providing by the TV service provider, as well. In the environment of the present invention, the decor-channel could be provided as a selected program during activation of the television (TV) set. The invention permits, when the decor-channel includes at least one decor-collection, each decor-collection could contain at least two decor-appearances. In this embodiment the method comprise the step of allowing the user with an opportunity to choose the screen decor-appearance from the chosen decor-collection of the decor-channel and to adjust the screen of the TV station with at least one decor-appearance according to the personal preference of the user. In the context of the present invention, the decor-appearances could be shifted by the TV service provider or by the user from the same or different decor-collections. abstract: A method to customize a screen of a television (TV) set as a decor-appearance via providing by a TV service provider at least one decor-channel with at least one decor-appearance, offering the decor-channel to the user, allowing to the user an opportunity to choose the decor-appearance of the screen of the television (TV) set according to a personal preference of a user. The decor-channel could be transmitted as a product, according to a contract between the user and the TV service provider, or as a free of charge.
